Not so good products ‚Ä¶ maybe you give them away ‚Ä¶ and pick up revenue through alternative channels.

Half-witted, reckless Librium Liz may be even worse than May and Johnson

‚ÄúBut the Tories are just playing with us. It‚Äôs as if the members said: ‚ÄòSo you think David Cameron is useless? Just wait until we give you Theresa.‚Äô And once we‚Äôd all had about enough of May, they gave us a narcissistic, sociopathic liar instead.‚Äù

‚ÄúNow, to top it all ‚Äì at least we hope so; surely there can‚Äôt be another one who is even worse? ‚Äì we‚Äôve been landed with Liz Truss. Someone who is not just half-witted and robotic, but reckless enough to bankrupt the country.‚Äù
